hotfolderPath.label: Hotfolder Path
hotfolderPath.description: Folder from which the files should be imported

ignoreFiles.label: Ignore Files
ignoreFiles.description: Comma separated list of files which will be ignored

extensionsAddAsText.label: Add as text
extensionsAddAsText.description: Comma separated list of file extensions, which will be imported as text

importNotebook.label: Notebook
importNotebook.description: If no notebook is specified, the import is made to the current notebook. Subnotebooks can be defined via Project\Scans

importTags.label: Tags
importTags.description: Comma separated list of tags to be added to the note

hotfolderAnz.label: Number of Hotfolders
hotfolderAnz.description: Additional Hotfolder Sections appear on the left (Please restart Joplin after a change)

extensionsAddTextAsTodo.label: Add text notes as Todo
extensionsAddTextAsTodo.description: Text only notes will be imported as Todo type notes, all other file types will be imported as attachments in regular notes

intervallFileFinished.label: File ready
intervallFileFinished.description: Every how many seconds should be checked whether the file in the hotfolder is ready, 0 = Deactivated

usePolling.label: Polling
usePolling.description: May be necessary for Hotfolders in the network. Leads to a slightly higher system load

pollingIntervall.label: Polling intervall
pollingIntervall.description: Interval in seconds for querying the hotfolder

error.notebookNotExist: Notebook `%s` for import destination of Hotfolder %s doesn't exist use actual notebook for imports
